name: Wireless Headphones
description: Experience high-quality sound without the wires. These headphones offer up to 20 hours of battery life and feature noise-canceling technology.

name: Smart Watch
description: Keep track of your fitness and stay connected with this sleek smartwatch. It includes a heart rate monitor, GPS, and notifications for calls and messages.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Monitor your daily activity and sleep patterns with this lightweight fitness tracker. It syncs with your smartphone to provide detailed insights.

name: Portable Charger
description: Keep your devices charged on the go with this compact and powerful portable charger. It has a capacity of 10000mAh, enough to charge your phone multiple times.
